description: To temporarily demolish and rebuild facade wall and redevelop site by the erection of a mixed use development comprising of three buildijngs of up to eighteen storeys containing 507 residential units (Sui Generis 17 live work units, C3 - 164 studios and 118 one bed apartments, 179 no. two bed apartment, 14 three bed apartments and 15 two bed duplexes), 164 parking spaces, ground floor retail, cafe/bar with external terrace, gym, residential amenity space in roof gardens/terraces, building concierge, reception, residents lounge, conversion of the existing mill into offices and associated access from Pall Mall - Amendment to 16F/0101.  **Revised description**
